definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Young anthers are composed of a protoderm and a central cell mass in early July.
sentences.chinese: 七月上旬，幼花葯，由原始表層和中央細胞團組成。

sentences.english: The parties concerned agreed to hold the Fifth Round of Six-Party Talks in Beijing in early November.
sentences.chinese: 各方商定11月上旬在北京舉行第五輪北京六方會談。

sentences.english: Berries mature during the first 10 days of October in Beijng.
sentences.chinese: 漿果在北京地區10月上旬成熟。

sentences.english: The above image was taken just after sunset earlier this month from Ras Lanuf, Libya.
sentences.chinese: 上圖攝於本月上旬，利比亞拉斯拉努夫日落不久後。

sentences.english: They were supposed to have relocated by now, with lectures due to have begun in the south in early May.
sentences.chinese: 它們如今本應該遷回，在五月上旬就應該開始授課。

sentences.english: BP says the first of the relief wells will be finished in the first half of August.
sentences.chinese: 英國石油公司表示，救災第一井將在8月上旬完工。

sentences.english: And in early July, appear even zero volume.
sentences.chinese: 而在7月份上旬，甚至出現零交易量的情況。

sentences.english: China bought another 2.2 million bushels of U.S. corn early this month.
sentences.chinese: 本月上旬，中國再次收購220萬蒲式耳的美國玉米。

sentences.english: The festival is held each year in late June and early July.
sentences.chinese: 民俗節在每年六月下旬和七月上旬舉辦。

sentences.english: At the beginning of June we will finish our Daichi journey.
sentences.chinese: 六月上旬，我們將會完成在大甲的行程。

definition: start of month/early in the month
end of month/late in the month
